title: Will UAE Emirates Return to the Top of the Tour De France? Pogačar’s Team Goes All-in on the Long-Term
content:
Mexican prodigy Del Toro joins through 2026 as Pogačar's crew turns to future winners to battle with Soudal-Visma merger.

Read the full article at Will UAE Emirates Return to the Top of the Tour De France? Pogačar’s Team Goes All-in on the Long-Term on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
